Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Increases the total amount of bonds the Buffalo sewer authority may issue
Summary: Increases the total amount of bonds the Buffalo sewer authority may issue from two hundred fifty million to five hundred million dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง1187, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to increasing the total amount of bonds the Buffalo sewer authority may issue
